mapper.select: SELECT id, tdl_id AS tdlId, ltp_date AS ltpDate, ltp_startplace AS ltpStartplace, ltp_endplace AS ltpEndplace, ltp_road AS ltpRoad, ltp_road_trip AS ltpRoadTrip, ltp_food AS ltpFood, ltp_food_trip AS ltpFoodTrip, ltp_ntype AS ltpNtype, ltp_road1 AS ltpRoad1, ltp_road_trip1 AS ltpRoadTrip1, ltp_food1 AS ltpFood1, ltp_food_trip1 AS ltpFoodTrip1, ldl_money_contain AS ldlMoneyContain, ldl_money_contain_off AS ldlMoneyContainOff, ldl_project AS ldlProject, ltp_remark AS ltpRemark, ldl_schedule_travel AS ldlScheduleTravel, gdd_img1 AS gddImg1, gdd_img2 AS gddImg2, ldl_trip_traffic AS ldlTripTraffic, ldl_recommend AS ldlRecommend, ldl_features AS ldlFeature FROM line_trip WHERE tdl_id = #{tdlId} order by id
